class.name: TextArea
class.author: Christopher Swenson
class.description: Builds an object that can display text on screen

constructor.param: style data to pass to the textArea

class.property: The text within the TextArea object

event.name: onClick
event.description: Fires when the TextArea is clicked

event.name: onMouseOver
event.description: Fires when the cursor is over the TextArea

event.name: onMouseOut
event.description: Fires when the cursor leaves the TextArea

method.name: setText
method.description: Sets the text of the TextArea
method.param: The text to display in the TextArea
